name: Skipping Turtles - iOS, Android, Mac, Linux, OUYA, PC Game
blurb: Skippy returns to battle Salty, the maniacal salt water crocodile to restore balance to Australia's Outback. iOS OUYA Android PC

rewards.reward: COPY OF GAME AND THANK YOU FROM SKIPPY - Skippy will send you a personal email thanking you for supporting him and receive a code for a free download of Skipping Turtles.  You will also become a member of Skippy Nation.

COPY OF GAME AND FAME - Receive a code for a free download of Skipping Turtles, become a member of Skippy Nation, receive a thank you email from Skippy, and have your name included in the game credits.  Skippy Salutes you!

SKIPPING TURTLES STICKER AND COPY OF GAME - You will receive all of the previous rewards as well as receive a limited edition Skipping Turtles sticker to place proudly for all to view and your name in our game credits.  (International shipping please add $10)

GAME PRINT AND COPY OF GAME - You will receive a print of our game and a free download as well as become a part of Skippy Nation, name in game credits, and sticker. (International backers we can email you the file or pay $10 for shipping)

FREE LIFETIME IN APP PURCHASES AND UPGRADES AND COPY OF GAME- These backers will be able to get all additional characters, future game releases, shells, etc, etc, everything our game offers forever for free!  You will also receive a copy of the game, name in credits, and member of Skippy Nation.

LIMITED EDITION SKIPPY SHIRT - These shirts will be exclusive to Kickstarter backers.  You will also receive a personal thank you email from Skippy, included in our game credits, your name in our game credits, and receive a free game code. (International shipping please add $10)

WAKE UP WITH SKIPPY - you will receive the Skippy Coffee Mug to proudly display as you are trying to awaken from a night of playing Skipping Turtles.  You will also receive the t-shirt, sticker, thank you from Skippy, your name in the game credits, and code to download the game.  (International shipping please add $10)

CUSTOM TURTLE SHELL FOR GAME PLAY - This is a rare opportunity to design a turtle shell that Skippy will use along his journey.  Each shell will have a different purpose and meaning in the game.  You can custom design your shell using your name, image, or logo as long as it isn't vulgar.  You will also receive a backer's shirt and copy of the game.\r\n(International shipping please add $10)

A BILLBOARD OF YOU IN OUR GAME! - That's right for only $200 we will place your name, company name, photo of you or company logo in our game on a billboard. So every time you play you will see it. You will also receive a shirt, copy of Skipping Turtles, and name in our credits. Limited number available. (International shipping included)

CHARACTER NAMED AFTER YOU! Salty's right hand villain needs a name, any name you want, as long as it isn't vulgar and this character will be featured in our game. (Image of character is in story) You will also receive a backer's shirt, sticker, and free download of our game. What will Salty's right hand villain be named???  (International Shipping included)

CHARACTER NAMED AFTER YOU! Skippy's little cousin has arrived and he/she needs a name. For this reward you can give Skippy's cousin any name you want, as long as it isn't vulgar and his cousin will be featured in our game. You will also receive a backer's shirt, sticker, and free download of our game. We are excited to see what his/her name will be. See images on left to see what character looks like. (International Shipping included)

CHARACTER NAMED AFTER YOU! Skippy's friend has arrived and he/she needs a name. For this reward you can give Skippy's friend any name you want, as long as it isn't vulgar and his friend will be featured in our game. You will also receive a backer's shirt, sticker, and free download of our game. We are excited to see what his/her name will be. (International Shipping included)

CHARACTER NAMED AFTER YOU! Skippy's friend has arrived and he/she needs a name. For this reward you can give Skippy's friend any name you want, as long as it isn't vulgar and his friend will be featured in our game. You will also receive a backer's shirt, sticker, and free download of our game. We are excited to see what his/her name will be. (International Shipping included)

SKIPPY'S ULTIMATE PROMO PACKAGE! - For this reward we will design a unique character/avatar and it will be included in the beginning of the game intro. You will also receive a backer's shirt, 10 Skipping Turtles stickers, download of our game, and game print signed by our creator. (International shipping included

DRAW YOU INTO OUR GAME - 1 lucky backer will be drawn into Skipping Turtles.  You will have the option of choosing yourself to take the adventure instead of Skippy as you play. How sweet of a reward is this?!  You will also receive a copy of the game, backer shirt, and Executive Producer in game credits. (Shipping included)

AUTHENTIC AUSTRALIAN DIDGERIDOO - One of a kind Didgeridoo from Australia,  Custom crafted by ABORIGINES.  Skippy falls asleep each night listening to the music from the didgeridoo.  You will also receive a copy of the game, backer shirt, 5 stickers, and name in credits as ELITE BACKER.  (International shipping included)
